website_summaries.verdict: Built tough for outdoor wear or a cozy day spent on the couch by the fire
pros: Reviewers claim the fabric feels soft enough to sleep in
Designed with some stretch to fit nicely beneath clothing

customer_reviews.title: Pilled Within a Week
customer_reviews.text: These are warm and soft, I will give them that. They would now be perfect to wear as a base layer UNDER something else. But, within a short week or two of wearing and washing gently, these are so pilled all over that they can’t be worn alone. And for this price point?!? I expected much much more.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Whoa, these leave the competition in the dust.
customer_reviews.text: Slim-waisted, wide-hipped (aka pear shaped) ladies, rejoice! This base layer was made for us. I spent a ton of money the last three winters on Smartwool, Icebreakers, and REI base layer bottoms, trying to stay warm. They worked to keep me warm but they didn't fit properly; I walked around all winter battling the urge to constantly adjust my base layer. These fit like a dream, and they're softer and less itchy than even my Smartwool. I ordered one, then I ordered two more, and now I'm figuring out which size top is best for me from this brand, because these are far superior to the much pricier merino wool items I've already got in my closet. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: McGee Whiz

customer_reviews.title: I pais the price for this leggings expecting to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I pais the price for this leggings expecting to be warm for this winter, it is only 34 Fahrenheit and i get very cold outside with this leggings under my pants. Too expensive they are not made for cold weather
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: WORN OUT IN LESS THAN A YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying that I bought these in November and wore them probably three times per week up until April. The legs have gone completely "pilly" and have now worn a big hole in the crotch. For the money I paid, I expected to get more than just a few months out of them! Extremely disappointed. That being said, they were extremely comfy and warm. I sadly cannot afford to buy another pair at the price for just a few months use though.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Cut Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back because the bottom of the legs was too tight, especially around the ankle. The fit overall seemed somewhat small. I wear a sz 10 pants and ordered a large in this and it just fit except for the tight lower legs.
customer_reviews.author: Merci

customer_reviews.title: Look more like long underwear than finished leggings.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for traveling to layer under super lightweight travel pants when the weather got colder. I specifically wanted Merino wool based on reviews that Merino wool is good for travel because it defies oder and balances body heat. The WoolX brand run a little small and they were slightly itchier than my cotton leggings, but they did hold up to a week of use and did keep me warm when I needed them. I would recommend them for the use I bought them for although I wouldn't recommend them for solo wear because the stitching looks more like long underwear than finished leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there for less cost
customer_reviews.text: I found a better quality and warmer product at Walmart for a portion of the price of these. Pants fit well but the waistband is SNUG. And after one day of walking around our ski resort the thighs were pilling like crazy. My thighs touch just like a majority of women, but no pant I've owned has ever pilled fast. NOT worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Rose

customer_reviews.title: They USED to be excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my sister. She loved them. They were light weight and warm. I purchased a second pair for her birthday. They SHRANK! For this price, that should not happen. I’m sorry that Woolx has lowered their standards.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these. They are so extremely comfortable. I bought them to wear under jeans to a Denver Broncos game on New Year's Eve in Denver. Little did anybody know it would go down as one of the coldest games in the history of the NFL for Denver with high of 20 degrees that day. It was cold. So I wasn't as warm as I was hoping, but honestly, these kept it bearable. All I was wearing on my legs were these wool pants, jeans and a blanket to cover. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND them. I wear these all the time by themselves they are so comfy. I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler21

customer_reviews.title: These are SO comfortable. I just bought a pair of Helly Hansen ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5"5' 122lbs and the XS fits me perfectly. These are SO comfortable. I just bought a pair of Helly Hansen Warm bottoms and these are WAY more comfy. Sure they cost $20 more too but I am tempted to send back the Helly Hansens and get another pair of these. It is because these have a wide, lower waistband which I like. My body is a little more straight rather than curvy and the Helly Hansens are too high and tight in the waste. Plus, this material is much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: jessey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Fir is true to size, and they retain shape, no baggy knees. Very warm, stylish and nice that they do not need frequent washing. An email accompanies the order confirmation with instructions on how to care for the leggings. Very helpful. Have purchased two pairs of the mid weight and will most likely get another pair of the heavy weight leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P.

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: Too short and itchy. Not good for high-waisted lasses, or those who are sensitive to materials. I love wool for its warmth, but smartwool is the only brand i can wear against my skin, and I'd still prefer silk or cotton to that except for wool's superior heat retention.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried them on they were itchy I'm glad I gave them another try. I wore them under skinny jeans all day and they weren't itchy and kept me warm but not hot all day. I love them not like those annoying long johns of old. Going to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm. Bad quality knitwork or moths :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bottoms and top because I get cold during the winter when I sleep, so I wanted to use them as a base layer. They're comfortable, the waistband isn't too tight, the length is good, they're very warm and don't retain smell, because they're wool. I was very disappointed that after a wash or two they got holes in the butt :( I've only ever used them as a base layer, so they didn't get snagged or anything. It was either shoddy workmanship or moths before I got them. It's unfortunate bc otherwise they're very nice, I don't know how much longer they'll last, though, which is unfortunate bc I but clothes to last.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel G.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite base bottom ever
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on when they arrived and didn’t want to take them off. The fit is perfect. The waistband is super comfortable. After a few washings, they have loosened up a little. They are thick enough that they can be worn as leggings. Liked them so much that I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: They are fantastic! I am sorry not to have ordered 2 as I am leaving for New York in the early morning-I will wear them every day I am there They are soft and fit very nicely. I had ordered another company simultaneously-but it was too short in the crotch These WoolX were PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other Woolx products
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric and color, but I’m somewhat disappointed with the fit. I wish that these leggings were a little higher up on my waist and that they were a bit heavier. These leggings are the fourth item that Ive bought from a Woolx, and on balance, I’ve been very happy with those tops. For the money, the leggings could be more high waisted and the fabric a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Quality design and warmth!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm, soft, and breathable. Really happy with overall quality and stitching. I’m a huge fan of the wide elastic waist band -no annoying pinching. Perfect for early (~25deg+) winter running!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: love natural fabrics, love wool
customer_reviews.text: i'm ordering this item for the second time in the past 12 months, what more should i say...at first i thought it's kinda expensive, now i think it's almost cheap for the quality it has...i live in a cold area and these wool leggings were perfect for outdoor sports etc during long winter months...
customer_reviews.author: honey1112

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dry, tummy and tights control
customer_reviews.text: I bought sz Small, Iam 57 kg and 164 cm. Iam in the border of size S and M and I went with Small because I heard it will stretch. It does stretch but not too stretchy and keep everything firm. I wore it in Vienna on late December and cashmere/wool pants on top of it. Warm without too warm. Comfortable though a bit tight on tummy. But, I prefer tight to control my tummy and a reminder not to eat too much. Easy to dry on hotel's room. I even put them above the radiator for a quick dry without damage.
customer_reviews.author: sesy hassan

customer_reviews.title: Details
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality. Skinny leg design. Wide waist band. I will buy from them again. But for comparison, I also like Munis 33 for the same quality and looser leg and narrower band.
customer_reviews.author: Rejoice Always

customer_reviews.title: ... on bottom normally but ordered the Medium and it's perfect. Unlike regular leggings
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 4 on bottom normally but ordered the Medium and it's perfect. Unlike regular leggings, there's no lack of mobility. They're super stretchy, long enough for my legs (I normally wear long lengths, 35" inseam to the ground) and the wide waistband is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit / Solid Teal Color
customer_reviews.text: Sooo...just know the teal is a solid color. LOL For sone reason, the pictuof the teal looks like it’s dark at the bottom and blends into teal at the top. To my surprise, it’s a solid color. Not sure if this is worth $75 for a lrg when I’ve found other wool leggings for a bit cheaper on Amazon. Very soft and appears to be good quality, I’ve got that pear/lrg tush figure like the other reviewer. Ha! These leggings fit GREAT!!! Might just be worth it IF they keep me warm while trekking!
customer_reviews.author: Harms Family

customer_reviews.title: Croach not as deep as I would have liked, and I did not like your brand name ...
customer_reviews.text: Croach not as deep as I would have liked, and I did not like your brand name being posted on the leg bottom of the leggings--nothing in your display indicated that that would be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Staying warm this winter.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for near daily wear as an underlayer beneath long skirts during the winter. Not see through. Waistband doesn't roll, but folds over time. More durable than silk long underwear, and can be wore as leggings. Not see through. Wore for walking, and found myself much more comfortable than when I wore polyester leggings previously. No more swinging from sticky-and-sweaty to freezing after going a high intensity pace to an easy and relaxed one.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: When I tried them on, you could see my skin over my thighs. I am 5'4'' and 120 lbs. Poor quality. I immediately returned. Perhaps I got a knock-off, who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight warmth and not itchy
customer_reviews.text: I love that these do not itch. I have very sensitive skin and usually have problems with wool. I wear them under my jeans for warmth and they work great, without making me too hot. I machine washed and dried them and they did not shrink or pill. So far they are holding up well. They look like underwear, so I don't wear them alone, but I wish I could.
customer_reviews.author: North Country M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Lift up the material to the light and you can see right through it. Your underwear will be visible. These are not leggings!! These are just wool long underwear. I am beyond dissapointed. These will not keep you warm any more than a cheap pair of leggings from Walmart. Save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Butler

customer_reviews.title: wish they were thicker for warmth
customer_reviews.text: It is made from WOOL!....I am all about sustainable products. I will not purchase any polyester, or plastic clothing that does not breath. I love linen, cotton, wool, silk, bamboo, cashmere, ipaca, rayon,.....only natural fabrics on my shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Allen

customer_reviews.title: buy these!
customer_reviews.text: i've tried other brands of base layer wool before, but these leggings are by far the softest ever. i wear these around the house every day and ordered 2 more pairs as well as the neck gaitor. perfect for lounging for those that aren't the active type :-)
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold climates!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these pants. They fit perfect. I’m 5’5” and 150-160 (fit) and they fit great. I wore them under winter pants for a trip to Iceland and I was perfectly warm 98% of the time. I would love to get another pair! It was in the height 20s to mid 40s. Or -7 to 8 degrees Celsius. Rain, wind and snow. Perfect underlayer for any weather! And cute. Fit just below my belly button so no muffin top problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. But it wasn’t what I was needing. Great Quality. Fit was true to size as well. Definitely recommend, very good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great value for mid weight wool
customer_reviews.text: Great weight and warmth, has washed well. As with all our Woolies I don’t put them in the dryer but machine washing has been fine. They run true to size. Wore them as PJs for 30-40 degree camping nights and under hiking pants in the cold mornings.
customer_reviews.author: April Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Kept Me warm in Utah
customer_reviews.text: Went to Zion and November and really helped to keep me warm. Also since i was camping i did not wash them for about 4 days and wore them everyday as my base layer. Did not smell at the end of the trip which was shocking to me as everything else did. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: CHPfleger

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully soft and warm. This under-layer bottom fits nicely at waist level, and doesn't ride down like some leggings do. I wear a large to extra large, depending on the item, and took a gamble on size ordering an extra large. I probably could have ordered one size down, but don't mind them being a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Lani L. Dundore

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to take these skiing! They are soft, not bulky, and they feel very warm. I love wool, so I'm sure they'll be perfect on the slopes. If this ski trip works well, I'll probably buy more. I got a medium, and I usually wear a size 8 or 10. The fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are so soft and not itchy at all. I use them under ski pants as a base layer and they keep me very warm. Only negative is that they are a bit long. I’m 5’6” and they cover my feet when stretched out fully. Regardless, I’ll be buying another pair. Totally worth the price and highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: mango7908

customer_reviews.title: No room for your butt
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fit over my butt. And, my bit isn’t Lillie a kardashian or anything. Just average. Too late to send them back for a larger size as I love the shirt and socks. They were a present and given to me past the return date
customer_reviews.author: Traveling_Robinsons

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy and great service
customer_reviews.text: My usual size was too small. Avery sent me the medium and a prepaid envelope to mail back the small. The medium fit perfectly. I just got back from Antarctica and these were perfect. Great leggings. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Rikkitic

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good base layer for a trip and found these - I have sensitive skin so tend to be wary of wool but these are really soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Beverage

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall women
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality wool and super soft however if you are tall be aware, these are more like a petit size. The lengthwise stretch is minimal. Although I’m usually a small/extra small in knitwear leggings the length is way to short for me (5’ 10”.) The stitched cuffs at the bottom ride up to my calf and uncomfortably mark my lower leg. Wish they came in extra long or at least didn’t have the binding bottom cuff.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. It fit well and was soft and comfortable. A little lighter than I expected and the stripes don't match the picture that closely, hence knocking off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: They feel really thin, and they don't have much stretch. I only had mine on for a couple of hours before the knees started to sag. They aren't very warm either. They'll work as a base layer, but for the price, I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: AngryDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Very fine quality leggings, and the longer length is perfect for my 5'10" height. The material is just the right thickness and very soft and cozy with a comfortable waist band that lies flat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hill Girl 8024

customer_reviews.title: Love my wool leggings.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see the leggings have a logo on the outside ankle. Luckily they are too long so I was able to get rid of the logo by shortening. Otherwise very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dk Holland

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as Heck
customer_reviews.text: These wool leggings are my new favorite thing. They are so comfortable, everytime I put them on to do outdoor activities I just want to wear them all day. I am somewhat self conscious about wearing them out in public without some sort of skirt over (like grabbing food after a day outside) because you can see underwear lines, but then I just think 'who cares' and do it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Good base layer - too thin for everyday leggings
customer_reviews.text: I loved the WoolX Stella leggings but since they were out of stock I thought I'd try the Avery. Same fantastic WoolX quality but they were not as stretchy nor thick enough for my hikes in Zion when temps were in the 40s and sometimes windy. I will keep them for warmer days! On another note, Hanks Clothing has excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are soft and comfortable, but they stretch out way to fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok leggings..but for the price I was expecting a lot more. They are soft and comfortable, but they stretch out way to fast and give you a saggy butt. They are already starting to get pilings too after two wears.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, but stretch out
customer_reviews.text: The stretch out quick. I think I’m going to use them on trail to sleep in. Third time wearing them and they look like elephants knees 😂
customer_reviews.author: RoseK

customer_reviews.title: Fit my naturally high waist
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have a high waist and other reviewers said they fit if you have a high waist. And they do! I really can’t stand the feel of high waisted pants that don’t actually reach MY high waist. These do.
customer_reviews.author: Arele

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the large because I like yoga pants and other tights in large (5'8" 155 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large because I like yoga pants and other tights in large (5'8" 155 lbs) and they fit ok except for waist, stomach area that is too big and results in a not so flattering look in the crotch. Cant decide to keep or return fearing they might shrink a little once washed even in cold. Will see if I wear them. Quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: SIZING IS WAY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Quality of product is great. Sizing is very small. I am not huge, I'm only 5'1" and I am chubby but no where near obese. I buy XL to have no waistband lines, and to have roomy non clinging leggings. The rise on these is so short that there's no crotch room at all. They become very uncomfortable when sitting for any length of time at all. Very disappointed. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan Merante

customer_reviews.title: Best Tights Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tights ever. They are comfortable and they help maintain body temperature- without being bulky. They fit perfectly- No sagging like most tights. Perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Soft as a babies...
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about fabrics. This is so soft it is amazing. Gonna get more
customer_reviews.author: Leslie V. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect temperature regulation with extreme comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these. If i was any taller they would be too short. Will not work for tall girls. Just barely long enough for me. I am 5 feet 6 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Lad

customer_reviews.title: She never liked wool before
customer_reviews.text: Worn often by my girlfriend. She never liked wool before.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: These fit me great. I am 5'6" and 150#
customer_reviews.text: These fit me great. I am 5'6" and 150#. The are comfortablly loose. If you like a tighter fit, I would get a medium. I just got them yesterday, but they seem much warmer than my cuddledud leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Blum

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and they are as soft as butter. I ordered one size larger than I normally do because I don't like close garments. They are a bit long (but then I'm a bit short) but can be easily hemmed up. I'm very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Filippi

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Medium bottoms, for reference I am 5’3”. 135-140 and these fit perfect. I am not sure how they would fit on someone much taller. Like other Woolx products softer than you would believe for all wool.
customer_reviews.author: Yanni66

customer_reviews.title: not enough wool on the market?
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but needed to me if cheaper I would buy one more. Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they would be soft & warm but I returned. They didnt fit right, were too big in waist and rise was too low. I could tell they wouldn't stay up well while skiing so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable and warm base layers I have. I plan to purchase a second pair. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: BevS

customer_reviews.title: toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: Only worn these a couple times but they kept me warm
customer_reviews.author: snowhappy

customer_reviews.title: Very fitted. Order up. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the medium. It was snug. Ordered the large and after washing and light drying and it’s perfect. I’m tall/ long armed and this shirt is wonderful on lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R.

customer_reviews.title: Fit problem
customer_reviews.text: The sewing was crooked making the fit like it was was on crooked....the side higher than the other. Love the fabric but could not bare the fit.....
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love Woolx! These. Leggings are warm, fit well, and can be worn as an inner or outer layer.
customer_reviews.author: SarahT

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not the softest merino, keep shopping! Also, I had to upsize from S to M ( I’m 5’9 and 135lbs) it runs short and way too tight. It has a weird fit in a crotch. Not what I expected .
customer_reviews.author: I. Gavenaite

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium I’m 5 8 and 150lbs, and love the feel as long as they don’t shrink they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for layering
customer_reviews.text: I wore this around camp while hiking in Peru. It layers nicely, and kept me warm through the night in 30 some degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: best fit for a 2xl  I have ever had !
customer_reviews.text: these ski bottoms fit perfect love the feel , will order more .
customer_reviews.author: R  reader

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable leggings!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to finally find a pair of merino leggings that fit well! I'm 5'7" and the medium fits perfectly. Great length, waist band is thick and comfortable. The leggings are also very soft and perfect for layering under my ski pants. So excited to have found this brand! I will be ordering another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They did not fit.
customer_reviews.text: The pants fit fine in the leg portion but the body section was a bit small. And did not pull all the way up to my waist. That is the reason I returned them. I will look elsewhere where I can try them without shipping being involved.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bond

customer_reviews.title: Soft & comfy
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect these leggings to be as soft as they claimed, but they are super soft & comfy! Love them & will definitely buy more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Tanledua

customer_reviews.title: Wore as a legging with a really long top
customer_reviews.text: Lower rise than would like, thinner than I expected too. However they kept me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft leggings and the wide waistband feels so comfortable. Great fit. I am 5’6” and weigh about 125. Bought a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Dacia

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are soooooo comfortable! Extremely soft and true to size. And my husband likes how the leggings make my booty look. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Worley

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I live in long underwear in the winter months. These are super comfortable and I love the wider waistband.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Warm and not at all scratchy next to my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: RenaissanceAutumn

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase of this base layer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of this base layer. They are very warm and comfortable. They also wash well.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Nice leggings but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointing considering the price. The leggings only lasted one winter of infrequent use before they developed a hole in the thighs from rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: froley

customer_reviews.title: Size Small
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. I’m 5’4 and 117 lbs. I purchased Small. They fit perfectly ! I didn’t have a chance to test them yet because it has been warm outside. I can’t wait to wear them. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft, and warm. What else is there?
customer_reviews.text: I liked them so much I bough another pair and also a pair of the heavyweight! They are soft, so comfy-cozy, and a warm base-layer. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: swifty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wool leggings
customer_reviews.text: These leggings fit great, look great, are very soft, and I'm sure will be a welcome addition to my outdoor gear. Buy some!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous reader

customer_reviews.title: Winter sports
customer_reviews.text: A little thin but not see through. Comfortable and warm. I used these as my only baselayer snowmobiling in ADK during frigid temps
customer_reviews.author: Dana Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great base layer, but not the best on their own.
customer_reviews.text: They are good for a base layer, but not great on their own. When you first put them on they feel great, soft and warm. But, by the end of the day they "grow" and they end up baggy in the butt. They also attract a lot of lint. I do love wearing them under my pants on hikes in cooler weather. They are also comfortable to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice leggings
customer_reviews.text: Love those leggings. They keep me warm but the price is a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Yang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under layer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect under layer. Kept me warm in very cold snowy weather !
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE MATHERNE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality knit and very soft. This is my second order.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great leggings. Very soft and warm. I used them in Winter Park (Colorado)
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya Fadeeva

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn't fall down while I walk. Keeps my legs warm and fits well under pants. Stays in place too. I'm 5'6 153 lbs and bought a medium. A little short in the leg but otherwise perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Utterly  delighted
customer_reviews.text: I'm prepping for a trip to Antarctica and am so tired of the black and gray base layer options in plus sizes. These fit beautifully, are amazingly soft, and come in fantastic colors. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. They are warm but breath and perfect under clothes or alone. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Brushdancer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Medium sized fit perfectly (form fitting, ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Medium sized fit perfectly (form fitting, not uncomfortably tight, but not baggy) on me, and I usually wear size seven “curvy” jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Very expensive leggings that did not keep me warm (same as regular leggings) and they became super baggy after about 30 minutes. Horrible and a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio A.

customer_reviews.title: Really soft!
customer_reviews.text: I tried them on but I haven't worn them yet. They are soft and the color is lovely. Looking forward to trying them out!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Weatherford-Zaluzec

customer_reviews.title: small hole
customer_reviews.text: There was a small hole when it arrived in the back. I love the pants besides that. Can I return it or get another one?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love live these
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Soft. Warm. Love these. Wish I could afford more. Incredibly soft for wool.
customer_reviews.author: annie pace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these leggings...they are a good quality wool and fit beautifully...I'm very happy...
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Rose

customer_reviews.title: They'll get the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are good, fit as any wool blend legging would. The legs stretch out the longer you wear them, then tighten up again after the wash. They're not my FAVORITE base layer per say, as far as warmth and comfort goes (compared to more athletic brands like Under Armour or North Face), but nice enough to wear with a long sweater and boots on a chilly day. I still get use out of them, but not sure if I would recommend to someone looking for a high quality, comfy, warm base layer.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small, but Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange the small for a medium, but once I had the right size, these are really comfy. Nice weight, soft and great maroon color.
customer_reviews.author: EWalker

product_meta.title: Woolx Avery - Women's Wool Leggings - Midweight Merino Base Layer Bottoms - Warm & Soft
feature_bullets: 100% Australian Merino Wool | 17.5 Micron | 230g/m | Midweight Warmth -Thermal Leggings

WARM & BREATHABLE: When you’re gearing up for a day outdoors in the middle of a harsh winter, leggings are probably your last cold-weather choice. But these midweight merino wool tights are the perfect pick for staying warm when the temps start dropping.

ALL DAY COMFORT : As a Merino Wool base layer, our winter leggings pull moisture away from your body, giving you incredible comfort and natural odor control! We even added wide bottom cuffs and a contoured back rise for a flattering fit.

SOFT AS CASHMERE: Made of 100% Australian Merino Wool, our thermal leggings add a bit of luxury to your wardrobe. They’re high quality, durable and ideal for layering under ski pants and other bottoms. Plus, they’re safe in the washer & dryer!

WICKS & ELIMINATES ODORS: The natural performance properties of merino wool underwear will keep you warm, dry, and comfortable in even the coldest temps. Natural antimicrobial properties kill the bacteria in sweat that creates odors.

CUSTOMER SERVICE LIKE NO OTHER: Between the no-itch fabric & the gorgeous colors, we know our leggings for women will quickly become your new wintertime favorite. If you have any problems just contact us at Woolx,no matter the issue we'll make it right!
